problems.title: Greatest Common Divisor of Two Numbers
problems.description:
The greatest common divisor (GCD) of two integers a and b is the largest integer that divides both a and b.

You are given two integers a and b. Find their GCD.

Input Format:
Two space-separated integers a and b.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the GCD of a and b.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
12 18

Sample Output
6

Sample Input
7 5

Sample Output
1
hintsList: Use Euclid's algorithm: while b != 0, set (a, b) = (b, a % b). When b becomes 0, a is the GCD.
